div.p:
xxiiijto die mensis februarij Johannes clerk adiudicatur satisfacere Dauid hill x s' pro
le basneto sibi prestitito prestito infra hinc / et festum sancti petri quod dicitur aduincula proximam
sequens datam istius scripti sine vlteriori dilacione adiudicatum fuit per compo
sitos ex vtraque parte concordit' electos /

Nono die mensis marcij anno Domini quo supra thomas smitht adiudicatur in amerciamento curie
pro iniusta perturbacione Roberti smitht et emendabit ei prout Jura volunt /

Robertus smitht adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione thome smitht in verbis
et emendabit ei prout Jura volunt

Eodem die cristiana de gordone' super quam gilbertus morison' porrexit plegium pro iniusta
detencione ab eodem de quinque solidis vsualis monete scocie pro firma vnius domus sepe
vocata ad sectam ipsius gilbertj non comparuit et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera tanquam primo die huius
processus

xvto die mensis marcij anno Domini quo supra Walterus blindsele plegio pro Johanne mernys
super quem Willelmus mernys porrexit plegium pro iniusta detencione vnius vacce ab eodem
sepe vocatus ad intrandum dictum Johannem et non intrauit eundem ad sectam dicti Willelmi tanquam
primo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando ad capiendum districtum de eo et ad dandum
sibi ad plegium si petatur et summoneat ipsum ad intrandum dictum Johannem ad proximam diem siue
curiam legalem et cetera coram balliuis ad sectam dicti Willelmi responsurus

Eodem die alexander fraser adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super Johanne stewart
et cetera

Eciam Dauid bog adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super elena parfyte
et cetera

Curia legalis burgi huius tenta per balliuos eiusdem xxjo die mensis marcij anno Domini quo supra
lxxjo /

Eodem die cristiana de gordon' sponsa Ricardj Waus' super quam gilbertus morison' extendit
plegium pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de quinque solidis pro firma vnius domus sepe vocatus ad sectam
ipsius non comparuit tanquam secundo die huius processus et ideo precipitur seriando et cetera

Eodem die gelice nauta adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta inobediencia seriandj et emendabit
preposito et balliuis prout Jura volunt

Willelmus club pistor adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij
super vno homine de patria et cetera /

the aldirman
Johne' of marr'
Androw alanson'
Johne' of scrogis
Androw scherar'
Alexander blindsele /
alexander of chawmer
Mathou fechat
patrik badenache
Dauy colyson'
Johne' of Knollis
Duncane sanchar'
Alexander meignes
Dauy simson' /

thir' personis sall pass' til alde abirdene on thurisday eftir paskis next to cum to
comone' with' the chanownys anent the act made betuix ws and maystir thomas
the Waus' anent the patronage of saynt michaell altar' /

Secundo die mensis aprilis Johannes caskin adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione
alexandri monypenny et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Eodem die alexander monypenny adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis
caskin' et emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Sexto die mensis aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxij secundo comparuit coram preposito et balliuis huius
burgi pro tribunali sedentibus in pretorio eiusdem prouidus vir andreas chapman burgensis dicti
burgi et fecit constituit et ordinauit dilectos filius suos Johannem mediocrem et Johannem Juniorem
suos procuratores et deputatos speciales dand' et concedend' dictis suis procuratoribus coniunctim et diuisim
suam plenariam potestate et mandatum speciale ad petendum et recipiendum nomine ipsius omnia et
singula bona et debita sibi debit' tam infra burgum quam extra et pro eisdem namand' et distringend'
detentores eorundem coram quocumque Judice ecclesiastico vel seculari prout Jura volunt et cetera et promisit
dictus constituens de Rato cum ceteris clausulis procuratorij necessariis et oportunis

Curia capitalis burgi de aberdene' tenta per balliuos in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
aprilis anno Domini et cetera lxxij quo die secte vocate et affirmata absentes patent inferius

Eodem die Johannes gregorij accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu sex solidorum
sibi annuatim debit' de terra andree Koutis cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico viridj inter terram Johannis litstar'
ex parte orientali et communionem viam regiam ex parte occidentali et quondam terram vastam ex parte australi et communionem
viam regiam ex parte boriali ad quam accedens nichill reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram
et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus Johan
ne simson' patricio smitht et Duncano de straloche seriando

Eodem die thomas de camera procurator et procuratorio nomine altaris beate marie virginis
scituati in ecclesia parochiali beati nicholaij burgi de abirdene et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu
octo denariorum debit' annuatim dicto altari de quadam terra vasta cum pertinenciis Jacente in le gren
inter terram Johannis litstar' ex parte orientali et communiones vias regias tam ex australi quod boriali
partibus et terram anteriorem quondam Willelmi Koutis ex parte occidentali ad quam accedens nichil re
perit distringibili pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram
balliuis in sacculo tanquam tercio die huius processus testibus patricio smitht Johanne simson' et Dun
cano de straloch' seriando

Eodem die dominus Johannes gall cum suo prelocutore thoma de camera qui est procurator
capelle sancte Katerine accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu octo solidorum
et octo denariorum debit' annuatim dicte capelle de quadam terra vasta cum pertinenciis Jacente in
vico nauium inter terram Johannis andirson' ex parte boriali et communionem venellam qua itur ad
dictam capellam ex parte australi ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo
redditu preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam tercio
die huius processus testibus Johanne gregorij patricio smitht et Duncano de straloche seriando

Eodem die dominus Dauid Waus' capellanus et procurator altaris sancte marie magdalene scituati
in ecclesia parochiali beati nicholaij huius burgi accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu
xj s' et octo denariorum debit' annuatim dicto altari de illa terra cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico viridj inter
terram thome Kege tam ex australi quam boriali partibus ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile
pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis
in sacculo tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus thoma Waus' henrico poilson'
et philippo de Drumbrek seriando

Item eodem die accedens ad barram dominus edwardus Roberti procurator Altaris beati
petri infra ecclesiam parochialem de Aberdene protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu x s' eiusdem terre
in preria protestacione habitis et contente Ad quam terram accedens nichil reperit et cetera
preter terram et lapides quos presentauit coram ballivis tanquam pro secundo die processus
testibus henrico portar thoma Waus et philippo Dumbrek seriando

Eodem die gilbertus moryson' accessit ad barram et protestabatur pro vno annuo Redditu x s'
lib' debit' annuatim de illa terra terra cum pertinenciis Jacente in vico viridj inter terras thome Kege tam australi
quam boriali partibus ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram
et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam secundo die huius processus testibus

Item Johannes nachty plegius pro Johanne Robertson' commorante apud skone' super quem mariota
relicta quondam Willelmi adamson' porrexit plegium in manibus Duncani de straloch' vnius seriandorum
dicti burgi pro iniusta detencione ab eadem de sex bolljs victualium sepe vocatus ad intrandum dictum
Johannem ad sectam dicte mariote non comparuit nec aliquem pro se excusantem tanquam primo die huius
processus

Patricius badenache plegius ad intrandum cristinum Dowy commorans apud alathane super quem
Johannes hill extendit plegium in manibus Duncani de straloche vnius seriandorum dicti burgi
pro iniusta detencione ab eodem de quindecem s' et tribus denariis ad bonum computum computat' sepe vocatus
ad intrandum dictum cristinum ad sectam dicti Johannis coram balliuis non comparuit nec aliquam sufficientem
essoniam pro se tanquam primo die huius processus testibus

Patricius Willamson' eodem die accessit ad barram tanquam heres legittime dicti Willelmi adamson'
et protestabatur pro vno annuo redditu quindecem solidorum sibi debit' annuatim de terra thome
benny tinctoris cum pertinenciis Jacente inter terram Jacobi crag ex parte orientali et quadam terram vasta vastam ex
parte boriali ad quam accedens nichil reperit distringibile pro dicto annuo redditu preter terram
et lapides quos presentauit in curia coram balliuis in sacculo tanquam primo die mensis aprilis
anno Domini Mmo CCCCmo lxxijo / testibus Donaldo de tulche Alexandro scot et Johanne de tulydeff seriando

Eodem die andreas litstar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione patricij Wys' et emendabit
sibi prout Jura volunt

Idem patricius Wys' adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione Andree litstar' et emendabis emendabit sibi
prout Jura volunt
Andreas Wricht adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione

Vxor dicti andree ly lytstar' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione dicti andrys litstar' Wricht et
emendabit sibi prout Jura volunt

Eodem die wardam et Judicium de actione mota inter robertum gillespy et Willelmi blindsele penes
duas barellas salmonum vsque ad quartum diem balliui continuauerunt dictum Judicium dare propter debilitatem
curie vsque ad hodie quindenam sine preiudicio alicuius partis et in eodem statu quo nunc est /

Eodem die comparuerunt in Judicio coram preposito et balliuis pro tribunali sedentibus in pretorio burgi
de aberdene' prouidj viri thomas litstar' et Johannes litstar' legaliter summoniti per adam de
craufurde pro veritate declarand' de melioracione duorum doliorum wadij empt' per dictum adam a
Johanne hyis' burgensi de ryssill' inter precium duorum doliorum wadij empt' a Willelmo longo de rissill'
qui Jurati dicunt quod duo dolia wadij empt' a Johanne hyis' sunt priora in precio quam dolia dicti Willelmi
de quolibet dolio xl s' ad minus /

Eodem eciam diem cristiana de gordone' sepe vocata ad sectam gilberti moryson' pro iniusta detencione ab
eodem de quinque solidis sibi debitis pro firma domus non comparuit tanquam tercio die huius processus et ideo
precipitur seriando et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos iiijto
die mensis may anno Domini Mmo CCCCmo lxxijo quo die secta vocata et curia aformata

Quo die alexander lpvison' sepe vocatus ad sectam Johannis Waus non comparuit
tanquam primo die huius processus quare precipitur seriando et cetera pro iniusta detencione
antique nobilis anglicanie et viij s' monete scocie

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta inj pretorio eiusdem et cetera viijo die mensis
may anno Domini Mmo ccccmo lxxijo

The semyn day the actione mouyt be tuex Temanis wyff and thom
campsy and is continuit to munnonday the xj day off may and the
said thomas sal wndirly the declaracioun off sys'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem et cetera
xjo die mensis may anno Domini Mmo ccccmo lxxijo

The semyn day Wiliam' cawdo is in' amarciment' be is awyn' off ge in grant
this cort be his awing grant for' the warnis strubelynis off fenlo forest and
to mend till hym' as' law vill

The xj day of may thoma fenllo forist in presens off the aldirman and off
balyes' in a fench cort his staplit and ordanit Wilyam blensill and
robart blensill the son' and mawis vormot burgis off abbirdene his
foull procraturis to foulow vilyam' of cawdyow' of for thocht
fellon' and bro borous' brokyng foulot be the sad fenlow forast / the
sade fenlow haldis frem and stabell quhat sumeuir the sade vilyam
robart and mawis laghfully dois or sal lede tobe done in his name or
ony ane of thaim in said actione and matir conc and in all vthiris materis concerning
the said fynlau within the burgh of Aberdene vndir the mar' oblising and ypotheke
of all his gudis present and for to cum with all vthiris clausis of procuratory in sic caus'
ordanit nedefull

Thomas campsy prosecutus per Elizabeth sponsam themanni auri fabri pro spoliacione et iniusta
detencione certorum bonorum dictis themanno et Elizabeth pertinen' quitus et immunus factus
est per assisam ad huiusmodi declaracionem et finalem determinacionem electam et Juratam ab omni
spoliacione sine iniusta intromissione d quorumcumque bonorum aut rerum per eundem minus iuste
peremptorum aut detentorum ab eisdem aut ipsorum altero et cetera

Curea balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem ann
xxix day off may die mensis may anno Domini Mmo lxxijo

the semyn day four' arbitoris chosyn be tuex Robert of buchan
and murdo glenmalwyne the quhilk arbitoris de clarat that the said
murdo salfullfyll the byll gyffin tyll him be s the said Robert that is to
say half a barrell of huny and half a barrell of pyk and
the lof in to lynt that be gude and fresch and weil chosyn

The samyn day Jok Walkar' promest to the bailyheis that hee suld
entir' be for tham a pon Wednysday or ony day fra thine furth
To the lard of murcoris challence and to bring with him a certane
off browne clath that hie lyttyt blak and the man that gaff it hym
in his hand

The first day of the moneth th off Jule June the yer' off our' lord a thousand
four hundre Sewinty and twa yer' et cetera th comperit Richard off Kintor' aldirman
than off our' burgh off abirdene and in his hand Johne' the son off wmquhile
gilbert off Kyntor burges' off the semmyn burgh' and askyt at the bailyeis
that na man at the bailyeis knawlage and kennyn to be giffyn to the forsaid
Jhone' the son off the semmyn gilbert as the law burhg wyll off all landis
and annuell rentis the quhilkis his fadir gylbert of Kyntor wmquhile
deyt last b west assesyt off in' the forsaid burgh as hie that wes
rychtwys' ayr' to the forsaid gylbert his fadir wmquhyle the quhilkis the
forsaid bailyeis weil awysyt with a certane of the wordy counsail kend
the forsaid Jhone the son of the forsaid gilbert to be werray and lachfull
ayr and of lachfull eild of aw land' and annuel rentis that his fadir deyt
last west and assesyt as a fee and ordand h delyuerit him to be put thar In

The semyn day Thom off symson st cald gert call alexander blind
seil patrik badyhenach Johne' the Waus and thom off chawmer
for wangwisly haldin off fourty schillyne with the mar' for wyne
siluer as the fyrst day quh nocht apperyt commandyt with the sariand

The semyn day Johne' moyses cauld to the instance of Jonet herwy be ane officiar'
for wrangwys' haldin off lettres and othir causis nocht comperyt as the first day
commandyt with the sarrasing

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eisudem per balliuos x die mensis Junij anno Domini
Millissimo ccccmo Septuagesimo secundo

TheThis whole entry has been deleted. semmyn day martyne newkirk scyppar' off Dawnskyn comperyt be for aldir
man and bailyeis in the tolbuth of abirdene and constituit and ordanyt his luffyd
frendis and in his name his his procuratouris coniuncly and seuerely To ask and to
rassaue all his dettis quhar' euir thai be aucht and princepely the x crownis
a nent the abbot of Deyris schip and vii crownis f Dauy abbirkyrdor' of Dunde

The semyn day mertyne newkyrk scyppar' of Dawnskyn comperyt be for aldirman
and bailyeis of abirdene in the tolbuth of the semmyn the quhilk martyne constituit and
ordanyt his weil be luffyt frendis thom pret sandris the hay his lachful and
wndoutyt procuratouris coniuncly and seuerly To ask and to rassaf al his dettis
quahr' euir thai be aucht and principely x crownis of the abbot of Deyrys
schip and vij crownis of Dauy abbyrkyrdor' of Dunde with othir sindry dettis
of this wryt Joh that is to say Johne' of scroggis Dauy Kyntor Dunkan
of straloch philp of Dunbrek Johne of tulydef

Curia legalis burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die mensis Junij anno
Domini Mmo ccccmo lxxijo

The semyn day Wylyam quelp wes adiugyt in the mercyament of a court for the wrang
wys' strybulance of the son of allan smyth and inobedyens of the offyciar' the
quhilk forsaid Wilyam comyttyt hym tyl assis' the quhilk assis' declaryt that the said
assis' Wilyam suld pay fyf mark at the wyll of aldirman and bailyeis quhen
it plesyt thiam to tak it and half a mark to the said son of allan smyth off the said
v merk on the secund day eftir the dat th of the said wryt
